New Records: Australia beat India 2-0 in their Asian Cup Group B opener, with second-half goals from Jackson Irvine and substitute Jordan Bos.
Key Match Events: Jackson Irvine scored a goal in the 50' for Australia
Jordan Bos scored a goal in the 73' for Australia
Pre-Game Insights: Australia's Arnold: Asian Cup the only tournament Australia can realistically win
Post-Match Reflections: Australia beat India 2-0 in their Asian Cup Group B opener
Miscellaneous Highlights: 36,253 attendance at the Ahmad bin Ali Stadium
Others: Gurpreet Singh Sandhu made 4 saves for India
Australia's starting lineup included Ryan, Behich, Rowles, Souttar, Jones, Irvine, Baccus, Goodwin, Metcalfe, Boyle, and Duke
